alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:18PM EDT until July 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bertie County in northeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Northampton County in northeastern North Carolina... Southwestern Hertford County in northeastern North Carolina... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 518 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rich Square, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Woodland and Roxobel around 525 PM EDT. Aulander around 550 PM EDT. Ahoskie around 600 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Eagletown, Kelford, Earleys, Menola, Connaritsa, Burden, Union, Bryantown, George and Saint John. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
